title: CBP OPR Ramey EEOC Complaint HS-CBP-02097-2020 (United States Customs and Border Protection)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Public court records show that CBP Agent Gilberto Velez filed an EEOC complaint in case HS-CBP-02097-2020 in August 2020. The same court records allege that an allegation of hostile work environment was filed against Gilberto Velez after the EEOC complaint. The court records can be found here: https://www.courtlistener.com/docket/68209604/1/gilberto-v-united-states-government/


Therefore, I request the following records:

1) The aforementioned EEOC complaint in case HS-CBP-02097-2020. 

2) The complete file of case HS-CBP-02097-2020.

3) The aforementioned allegation of hostile work environment filed against Gilberto Velez.

4) The oficial notification labeling Gilberto Velez as having anger issues given to him by Division Chief Roberto Arias, which Velez alleges exists in the public court records.

5) Any communications, messages, emails, and attachments concerning case HS-CBP-02097-2020 and the investigation of the aforementioned complaints and notifications.

To help limit the extent of the responsive documents, please limit search from Jan 1, 2020 through Jan , 2023. Please deliver these documents on a rolling basis as responsive documents are found. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. It will be used in the course of reporting for Marea Ecologista, an independent journalism outlet. (https://mareaecologista.com/)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco

title: CBP OPR Ramey EEOC Complaint HS-CBP-02097-2020 (United States Customs And Border Protection, Aguadilla)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Puerto Rico public records law, I hereby request the following records:

Public court records show that CBP Agent Gilberto Velez filed an EEOC complaint in case HS-CBP-02097-2020 in August 2020. The same court records allege that an allegation of hostile work environment was filed against Gilberto Velez after the EEOC complaint. The court records can be found here: https://www.courtlistener.com/docket/68209604/1/gilberto-v-united-states-government/


Therefore, I request the following records:

1) The aforementioned EEOC complaint in case HS-CBP-02097-2020. 

2) The complete file of case HS-CBP-02097-2020.

3) The aforementioned allegation of hostile work environment filed against Gilberto Velez.

4) The oficial notification labeling Gilberto Velez as having anger issues given to him by Division Chief Roberto Arias, which Velez alleges exists in the public court records.

5) Any communications, messages, emails, and attachments concerning case HS-CBP-02097-2020 and the investigation of the aforementioned complaints and notifications.

To help limit the extent of the responsive documents, please limit search from Jan 1, 2020 through Jan , 2023. Please deliver these documents on a rolling basis as responsive documents are found. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. It will be used in the course of reporting for Marea Ecologista, an independent journalism outlet. (https://mareaecologista.com/)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arkansas Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I’m looking for further information on disciplinary actions (preferably a copy of the consent order) for the following businesses. I’ve included the license numbers. 

Arkansas retail pharmacy:
City Rexall AR02230
East Arkansas Family Health Center, Inc. AR09436
Harp’s Pharmacy #186 AR20303
Walgreens #10365 AR20551
Walmart Pharmacy #10-5738 AR20597

Wholesale distributor: 
PharMEDium Services, LLC WD02501
SHS Select Health Services, LLC WD03246

Supplier medical equipment: 
Central Healthcare LLC MG00773

Let me know if you need any more information.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sonny Albarado, a citizen of Arkansas, in coordination with Siobhan Standaert.

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Pike-VV
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any documents, memorandum, communications, reports, investigation findings, or files related to the Village Voice's February 16, 1976 publication of leaked information from the Congressional investigation into the CIA and the intelligence community.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Guariglia
